r.s: Utility class for dealing with MIME types
r.d: Provide functionality for dealing with MIME types. * Parse MIME type. * Supports full RFC2045 specification. * Many utility functions for working with and determining info about types. * Most functions can be called statically. * Autodetect a file's mime-type, either with mime_content_type() or the 'file' command.
r.n: * Add $parameters class var. (Fixes #2083) * Quote filenames in _fileAutoDetect() (Fixes #2078)
